facet_1.name: Voidblades
facet_1.effects: Applies both of Meld's bonus attack damage component and the debuff to Psi Blades-affected enemy units.

facet_2.name: Refractor
facet_2.effects: Refraction gains an additional bonus attack damage charge every time a barrier instance is depleted.

facet_3.name: Hidden Reach
facet_3.effects: Grants bonus attack range over an effect delay duration upon Meld cast.

effects: Teleports Lanaya to the nearest Psionic Trap after channeling and detonates it upon arrival, damaging and slowing enemy units around it
Increases max Psionic Trap count and its vision radius
Lanaya's transposition applies silence within the radius upon arrival

level_15: Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled
level_10: +5% Trap Move Speed Slow / +5% Psionic Projection Move Speed Slow

abilities.name: Third Eye
abilities.description: The Hidden Temple exposes Roshan's respawn timer to Layana's team.
abilities.details: The Roshan respawn timer is located above both the Scan and Glyph of Fortification ability.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Lanaya's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. She may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Hidden Innate Abilities with various functions

ability_1.name: Refraction
ability_1.details: Grants all damage barrier instances that negates damage. Both the damage negation component and the bonus attack damage component have a limited number of instances and are independent of each other.
ability_1.description: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.

facet_effects.refractor: Refraction gains an additional bonus attack damage charge every time a barrier instance is depleted.

interaction_notes: Interrupts Lanaya's channeling abilities upon cast
The ability has three main components that are applied upon cast and are independent of each other

ability_2.name: Meld
ability_2.details: Conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If the invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage and reduce the affected enemy unit's armor for the duration.
ability_2.description: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.

facet_effects.voidblades: Applies both of Meld's bonus attack damage component and the debuff to Psi Blades-affected enemy units.
facet_effects.hidden_reach: Grants bonus attack range over an effect delay duration upon Meld cast. Effect Delay: 1, Attack Range Bonus: 400

interaction_notes: All offensive ability components do not affect buildings
The invisibility component persists upon losing ability through Morph or Spell Steal

ability_3.name: Psi Blades
ability_3.details: Attacks slice through the attacked unit, spilling and damaging enemy units reduced by a percentage per unit behind it. Grants self bonus attack range.
ability_3.description: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.

facet_effects.voidblades: Applies both of Meld's bonus attack damage component and the debuff to Psi Blades-affected enemy units.

technical_details: Attack Damage to Spill Damage Factor: 0.7/0.8/0.9/1
interaction_notes: Do not spill damage when attacking buildings regardless of the ability visual effects

ability_4.name: Psionic Trap
ability_4.details: Places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movements. Marks the ground with magical and psionic traps.
ability_4.description: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
interaction_notes: Does not block neutral creep camps
Roshan destroys this unit in one punch
Specifically does not grant vision within Roshan's pit

ability_5.name: Psionic Projection
ability_5.details: Teleports Lanaya to the nearest Psionic Trap after channeling and detonates it upon arrival, damaging and slowing enemy units around it. Projecting herself to the distance does not break Lanaya's Meld upon cast.
ability_5.description: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.
interaction_notes: Acquiring Aghanim's Shard unlocks this ability
Root and Leash sources prevent the teleport component but don't interrupt channeling

sub_ability.name: Trap
sub_ability.details: When sprung at Lanaya's command, the traps apply a movement speed slow based on the charged-up time. Only deals damage over time if the trap is fully charged.
interaction_notes: Does not interrupt Lanaya's channeling abilities upon cast
Cannot be cast when there are no Psionic Traps present

changes: Refraction: Reduced attack damage bonus from 20/40/60/80 to 15/30/45/60
Refraction: Increased mana cost from 85 to 95
Meld: Reduced attack damage instance from 70/125/180/235 to 55/105/155/205
Meld: Reduced armor reduction from 5/6/7/8 to 3.5/5/6.5/8
Aghanim's Shard upgrade: Reduced Trap min silence duration from 1 to 0.25
Talents: LVL 10 +2.5s Meld debuff duration reduced to +2s
Talents: LVL 15 +100 Psi Blades attack range/spill ranged â†’ +3 Meld armor reduction
Refraction: Increased number of instances from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6
Talents: LVL 25 +3 Refraction instances increased to +4
